name: Super Bandit Arcade
description:
It's time to kick butt!

Super Bandit Arcade is an arcade bullet hell game inspired by gems such as Geometry Wars. You control one of 3 characters, and grind for your next best score! Fight and dodge through waves of enemies, varying from riflemen to assassins to giant turrets. 

- 10 enemy types

- 3 unique characters

- hundereds of bullets to dodge
